Internal use function.

This function's parameters and processing may change in future SDKs.

Finalize command buffer

Returns:
: number of command words in command buffer and jump buffer or negative number on error.

Internal use function.

This function's parameters and processing may change in future SDKs.

Add a subdescriptor into a command buffer, and handle command-buffer overflow by allocating a JUMP_s buffer from PKO3 internal AURA.

Internal use function.

This function's parameters and processing may change in future SDKs.

Backward compatibility for packet transmission using legacy PKO command.

NOTE: Only supports output on node-local ports.

TBD: Could embed destination node in extended DQ number.
